response.overview: You don't have to visit the museum to find priceless works of art, stunning jewels, or riches untold -- just look around you.  In Hidden Treasures, you'll explore the intricate beauty of a simple snow crystal.  Swim the crowded ocean within a single drop of seawater.  Marvel at a desert flower too tiny for the sharpest eye to see.  And in the end, you'll learn how the greatest treasure of all is to meet the Creator of all you behold and know Him as your own, heavenly Father.
response.title: Hidden Treasures
